author: Special Correspondent
text:
Five passengers were injured after a State Transport Corporation bus hit a lorry on the Tiruchi–Thanjavur national highway near Kattur on the city’s outskirts on Wednesday.

The sand-laden lorry was proceeding ahead of Tiruchi-bound bus from Thanjavur when the accident occurred at Amman Nagar intersection. Police sources said the lorry suddenly took a ‘U’ turn without any warning.

The driver of the bus that was behind the lorry lost control and the vehicle hit the goods carrier and entered into a vacant site nearby.

The lorry overturned in the collision which caused injuries to five passengers on board the bus.

Driver on the run

The lorry driver escaped from the spot abandoning the vehicle. The Tiruverambur police are investigating.
title: Five injured as bus rams lorry in Tiruchi
